title: Computer crashes/frezzing
body:
I can't even play the game, I already disable the game bar, that worked for 5 months.
But today in rank my computer freeze without warning.
I also tryed downloading a cooling system software  but that does not seem to work.

replies.body: If disabling that game bar was the quickest fix in the past, let's make sure to check to see if it was turned back on. Some of the Windows updates have been known to automatically turn it back on, but if that's not the case go ahead and run through this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) as well.

I tried everything and even went to check if the game bar was disable and it was indeed still disabled. I guest I'll let you know if it still crashes.
